about_the_game:
NOTE:
- This game has controller support, it does need some updates before controller support can be officially added to the store page!
- There is a known bug that might happen, if you finish a level the first time you might not be able to finish it. Continuing/Loading the first level and then exiting to the main menu and Continuing/Starting the first level again will fix this. Fixing this bug is extremely difficult since I cant recreate it myself.

You are a living piece of dough, one day you land on a planet and walk into a restaurant. But soon after walking in you realize it is a pizza restaurant, the chef quickly realizes that you are the perfect ingredient for his prized pizza. Now you must run through different environments to avoid getting caught by the chef.

Are you ready for the remastered version with Lumpy the magical space dough? Fly across worlds, jump trough levels and escape the evil chef before he catches you and bakes you into a PIZZA!

This project is a remastered version of Justin's first ever released project, The Tales of the Magical Space Dough. Help Lumpy cross trough difficult and dangerous environments while running away from the chef.

This new version will be a little more balanced, the controls will be a little nicer and the difficulty wont spike way too quick. This doesn't mean it will be easier, to maintain the original idea of the game it will still be a hard platformer.

So what does the game offer for now:

- 20 Exciting levels that slowly introduce some new mechanics

- 2 Awesome themed worlds

- Achievements for every level

- Top 10 fastest times per level

- Top 10 least deaths per level

- A checkpoint mode

- A story intro cutscene

- 2 Level surprises that I'm not going to spoil (guess you got to play to find out :p)

- 5 Awesome soundtracks that were made by me and/or my dad

- A endless runner mode

- Hopefully a good experience

Enter the wonderful world of The Tales of the Magical Space Dough: Rebaked and prepare to be embraced by the wonderful mysteries created by Mystical Orb Inc.

Listen to the soundtrack over at Justin his SoundCloud profile: 
The Tales of the Magical Space Dough: Rebaked - OST - justifrusti

If you want to take a look at other projects Justin has made take a look at his Itch.io page and if you are interested in his Portfolio take a look at his section on the studio website.
detailed_description:
NOTE:
- This game has controller support, it does need some updates before controller support can be officially added to the store page!
- There is a known bug that might happen, if you finish a level the first time you might not be able to finish it. Continuing/Loading the first level and then exiting to the main menu and Continuing/Starting the first level again will fix this. Fixing this bug is extremely difficult since I cant recreate it myself.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 143 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: You are a living piece of dough who lands on a planet and enters a pizza restaurant. The chef, seeing you as the perfect ingredient for his prized pizza, chases you through various environments. Now, you must escape to avoid becoming the main course!
